summary: I am a computer science engineering student, having four years of higher education in this field and having accomplished some small projects and freelance work, I have now a good experience in analysis and programming of applications. I like solving complicated problems and programming challenges.

education.name: Institut Supérieure d’Informatique, de Modélisation et de leurs Applications
education.description: Dual-Diploma programme with ISIMA, College of Engineering in Computer Science, Modelling and Applications delivering a diploma equivalent to a Master's Degree in Engineering. Studying Software Engineering and Information Systems

education.name: École Nationale Supérieure d’Informatique et Analyse des Systèmes
education.description: College of Engineering in Computer Science and Systems Analysis delivering a diploma equivalent to a Master's Degree in Engineering

education.name: Classes préparatoires aux grandes écoles d'ingénieur
education.description: Preparatory classes for competitive examination admission to an engineering school

education.name: Moulay Rachid high school: Baccalaureat of mathematical sciences
education.description: Equivalent to a High School Leaving Certificate

skills.description: Processing languages, simulation and meta programming

jobs.title: Creation of modular client web application for analysis using AngularJS
jobs.description: Making a client application which will consume a REST webservice and display different types of charts to users. The application should be flexible and give the ability to add new modules easily without changing its core.

jobs.title: Comparative study and validation of test automation tools
jobs.description: Comparing free and paid testing tools present on the market to select the best tools for functional testing, load testing and manual testing

jobs.title: Development of web application for school
jobs.description: Worked with three other students to build a complete management application based on the web handling students registration, plainning, projects, internships and marks. Teachers can share their lectures with students and manage projects. Features for administration are included too

jobs.title: Development of hotel web management application
jobs.description: A web application including presentation pages of the hotel, different rooms and restaurant types, and other services, online booking and feedback systems. It includes an administrator control panel to manage reservations, rooms, clients and all settings

projects.title: Be-responsive jQuery plugin
projects.description: Responsive table jQuery plugin by transforming each row into a table like style using CSS

projects.title: Smart Pieces
projects.description: Simple framework to build smart pieces of code and generate them from the command line. With a plugin for Sublime Text 3 to insert snippets while typping code.

projects.title: RSS Reader
projects.description: Web application giving the possibility to subscribe to RSS and Atom channels and receive new feeds. The ORM layer was made from scratch and Silex framework was used to handle requests as a REST API. Unit and functional tests are included

projects.title: Fuzzy logic application
projects.description: Desktop application to aggregate and calculate indicators using fuzzy logic.

projects.title: Basic EJB container
projects.description: Simple EJB container made from scratch handeling Stateless and Statefull EJBs lifecycle, injecting EntityManager and handeling transactions. Unit tests are made for every feature.

projects.title: Collect module for Puppet
projects.description: This module constructs files from multiple fragments in an ordered way. It doesn't require additional space to save temporary fragments and doesn't depend on any other module.

projects.title: Class Code Generator
projects.description: A simple command line application which is able to generate basic code (constructors, getters, setters ...) for any OOP programming language. It's actually able to generate C++ and Java code based on customizable templates for code style.

projects.title: Simulation of competition between students and laureates for internships and jobs
projects.description: The core of the simulation program is build in C++ to insure performance and we made a web UI to be cross platform. The core and the UI communicate via Sockets.

projects.title: Employer management application
projects.description: A simple employer management Java application with graphic interface, images and basic add, view, edit and delete features using a binary file as database.

projects.title: Mini Java compiler
projects.description: A mini complier of Java code source using a simple interpreter instead of JVM written in C.

projects.title: Isola 2D board game
projects.description: A two-player abstract strategy board game. Each player moves their piece and removes one square from the board. The first player who can’t move loses.

interests: Programming and algorithmic challenges and puzzles
